reg.title: Additional Tax Regulation (District of Oak Bay)

section.sectiontext: Section 3 (1) of the Hotel Room Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 207, applies in respect of accommodation purchased within the District of Oak Bay.
The additional tax payable under that section is 2% of the purchase price of the accommodation.
The amount paid to the municipality out of the revenue collected from the tax may be expended for the purposes of tourism marketing, programs and projects.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
